resources.string: Force stop the corresponding application to apply the settings.
View all app behavior does not filter whitelisted applications and system applications.
- Prevent Security app from recovering system apps\' WLAN connection setting\n- Show System apps\' WLAN setting

- Enable System apps' WLAN setting
- Skip warning time (Ignore the countdown numbers by yourself)

*Prepare for unforeseen consequences.
As same as WooBox for MIUI Set 100 points on Security app
Can only translate or transcribe Chinese and English.

As same as WooBox for MIUI *Remove OTA validate.
- Only support VAB series use, please do not open other series.
- No need for internal testing qualification to flash into the full internal testing package.
- Those who have internal testing permission will not be able to receive internal testing updates, and can be used to block system updates.
- After cross-version type upgrade, it is recommended to clear data.
- Unofficial ROM usage is not supported.

*Prepare for unforeseen consequences.

Already enabled? Click here to stop the module, then open the module settings again.
Restore Nearby Sharing Quick Settings Tile
App Behavior Record system applications whitelist
Whitelisted some system applications to prevent Privacy Protection Notifications from scaring users who don\'t know how to turn them off.
Change App Info \"Clear defaults\" to \"Open by default\"
Allow app to open supported links
Don\'t allow app to open links
Allow floating notification, notification sound, notification vibration, notification on the lock screen by default.
Are you sure to force stop SystemUI?
Requires ScreenRecorder app version x.12.6.1.x or later.\nTurn off if you experience problems with audio recording.
Opening settings from notification menu leads to channel settings instead of app\'s common notification settings
If you can\'t swipe to -1 screen when using Google Discover, force stop Google App
